colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES 'DI NI SPYANG GI GNOD CHEN LA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI BYAMS PA SNYING RJE SEMS BSKYED KHAS MA H'A K'A LA SPRUL SKU GSUM SKYE SHES PA RIN PO CHE ZHING SPRUL SKU LCAM SRING ZHAL GZIGS GIS 'BYUNG BYANG SEMS THAMS CAD DON DU DU RTA PHYAG RNAMS LA SPYANG GI GNOD PA MANG PO PHYAR DU KHRO BO DON ZHES BYA BA BZHIN DU BRNYED DKA' SKAD SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN NO, ,SHU BHAm, ,DGE'O, ,AOm MA NI PAD ME H'Um,, ,,)
